document_data.name: Crystalic Healing and the Psychometabolist
document_data.author: [[House Oblodra]]
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite adventurers league/Old Bones and Older Tomes|29}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Crystalic Healing and the Psychometabolist''''' was a book on [[psionics|psionic]] topics, such as [[psychometabolism]], that was written by members of [[House Oblodra]] sometime prior to the [[Spellplague]].
document_data.Notable Owners: * The [[Lakoni]] and [[Mompono]] tribes of [[Chult]].{{Cite adventurers league/Old Bones and Older Tomes|9-10}}
